title: Bug 10403: Project creation confirmation for scrubbing the bin directory
OB: When a user creates a new project for an existing directory structure, we should confirm that the bin directory can be deleted and then rebuilt. Some users are creating projects and pointing the output folder to a bin directory that contains more than just .class files, which can be rebuilt from the available .java files.
EB: When creating a new project, there should be a confirmation prompt to ensure that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
